medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient is a 65-year-old male physician whose illness began with fatigue and mild myalgia on April 18, 2014 (DOI 1), followed by low-grade fever. He developed a dry cough on DOI 10 and presented to an Indiana hospital on DOI 11 dyspneic and hypoxic. His maximum temperature was 38.6Â°C on DOI 12.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has hypertension and coronary artery disease for which he had two stents placed 5 and 17 years ago. He also has benign prostatic hypertrophy and had prostatitis 2 years ago.
medical_history.social_history: The patient works full-time at a large hospital in Riyadh. He does not smoke or drink alcohol.
